# `call()`

Use `nhost.functions.call` to call (sending a POST request to) a serverless function.

```ts
await nhost.functions.call('send-welcome-email', {
  email: 'joe@example.com',
  name: 'Joe Doe'
})
```

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">url</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> `string`

---

**<span className="parameter-name">data</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> `D`

---

**<span className="parameter-name">config</span>** <span className="optional-status">optional</span> `AxiosRequestConfig<any>`

---
